message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am comfortable going up to $9,200 for the product.
